name: Austin
description:
If you hit my left cheek, don't even think
you'll have time to bit the right one too.

name: Candamir
description:
A well-sharpened axe is a tried and tested starting
position for a successful conversation.

name: Harald
description:
I knock you out faster than you can
carve the word 'strategy' in this stone.

name: Inga
description:
The gods are expecting more offerings
And they expect you to hand them over to me!

name: Osmund
description:
When it comes to gold and women, friendship stops.
And it also stops when it comes to power.
Actually, friendship never lasts very long.

name: Siglind
description:
Turning men into heroes belittles
the importance of being a hero.
